# card-component



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                              | Description                                                                 |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--card-body-content-padding`     | The padding for the card-body-content. Defaults to 20px                     |
| `--card-body-font-size`           | The `font-size` for the card body text. Defaults to 16px                    |
| `--card-body-text-color`          | The color for the card body text. Defaults to #6c6868                       |
| `--card-border-radius`            | the border-radius of card. Defaults to 10px                                 |
| `--card-box-shadow`               | the box shadow of card. Defaults to 0 0 10px 6px #cac7c7                    |
| `--card-max-wdth`                 | the `max-width` of card. Defaults to 330px                                  |
| `--card-sub-title-color`          | The color for the card sub title. Defaults to #534f4f                       |
| `--card-sub-title-font-size`      | The `font-size` for the card sub title . Defaults to 14px                   |
| `--card-sub-title-font-weight`    | The `font-weight` for the card sub title. Defaults to bold                  |
| `--card-sub-title-padding`        | The padding for the card sub title. Defaults to 0 0 10px 0                  |
| `--card-sub-title-text-transform` | The `text-transform` property for the card sub title. Defaults to uppercase |
| `--card-title-color`              | The color for the card title. Defaults to #000000                           |
| `--card-title-font-size`          | The `font-size` for the card title. Defaults to 30px                        |
| `--card-title-font-weight`        | The `font-weight` for the card title. Defaults to bold                      |
| `--card-title-padding`            | The card title padding. Defaults to 0 0 10px 0                              |
| `--card-title-text-transform`     | The `text-transform` property for the card title. Defaults to capitalize    |
| `--card-wdth`                     | the `width` of card. Defaults to 100%                                       |
